'''13w21b''' is the ninth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on May 27, 2013<ref>{{tweet|Dinner|338943669954560000}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w21a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w21b|prefix=Snapshot
|;old
|11605|Certain death message will print "null" as the player/mob name that caused the death.
|16554|lang files for en_US is grammatically incorrect at death.fell.finish.item.
|;dev
|15815|Enchanted items stored in a donkey / mule lose enchantments on its death.
|;previous
|16143|Sprinting and speed effect not working.
|16144|Server doesn't translate strings.
|16150|No sounds after a while/music corrupting sound.
|16353|Crash: IllegalArgumentException.
}}</onlyinclude>
